Welcome.Title: Welcome To Liberia Expeditions!
Welcome.Subtitle: Your gateway to the natural beauty and vibrant culture of Guanacaste province, Costa Rica!
Welcome.Paragraph-1: Nestled in the heart of Guanacaste, we offer travelers a unique experience of this stunning region, from its pristine beaches and lush rainforests to the breathtaking volcanoes and waterfalls.
Welcome.Paragraph-2: Our passion is to showcase the best of Costa Rica, creating memorable journeys that blend adventure, relaxation, and authentic cultural experiences.

Tours.Title: Tours
Tours.Subtitle: Explore the best things to do in Guanacaste

FormSection.Title: Have any questions?
FormSection.Subtitle: We will be happy to contact you

ContactUs.Title: Contact Us
ContactUs.Subtitle: Our customer team is ready to hear from you

TourBuenaVistaRincon.Name: Tour Buena Vista del Rincon
TourBuenaVistaRincon.Introduction: Join our guided horseback tour through lush trails, stunning landscapes and hidden spots, perfect for adventurers of all levels seeking an authentic connection with nature.
TourBuenaVistaRincon.Description: A guided tour to a beautiful place where you will live a memorable experience. Doing it on horseback makes the experience unforgettable. You will enjoy relaxing hot springs. You will learn about the culture of the area. In addition to enjoying the flora and fauna of a tropical rainforest.
Attractions: On the way, enjoy a relaxing horseback riding experience.
Sightings of howler monkeys, toucans, butterflies, armadillos, among others.

Requirements.SizeGroup: There is no minimum group size..

TourRainForest.Name: Tour Rain Forest
TourRainForest.Introduction: Explore the beauty of the rainforest with visits to natural waterfalls, volcanic sites, and encounters with unique wildlife.
TourRainForest.Description: This tour takes you through Costa Rica's rainforest, where you'll experience breathtaking landscapes, lush wildlife, and cultural flavors.
Includes: Transportation to and from the tour locations
Recommendations: Wear comfortable hiking shoes and clothing
Bring a raincoat or waterproof gear

TourHornillas.Name: Tour Hornillas
TourHornillas.Introduction: A family-friendly tour offering a unique experience in nature and wildlife exploration.
TourHornillas.Description: Explore the beauty of the rainforest with activities that include horseback riding, hanging bridges, waterfalls, volcanic mud baths, and hot springs. Ideal for families and nature enthusiasts seeking adventure and relaxation.
Schedule: Pick up time: 7:00 a.m. or 9:00 a.m.
Includes: Transportation to and from the location
Access to hanging bridges and waterfalls
Guided hike to an active crater
Recommendations: Bring a swimsuit and towel for the hot springs
Carry a water bottle and a change of clothes
Be prepared for light rain in the rainforest

TourSunsetCruiseAndSnorckling.Name: Tour Sunset Cruise and Snorckling
TourSunsetCruiseAndSnorckling.Introduction: A breathtaking tour along the Pacific coast of the Papagayo Peninsula, perfect for those seeking adventure and relaxation on the water.
TourSunsetCruiseAndSnorckling.Description: Embark on a scenic sailboat cruise along the beautiful coastline, enjoy crystal-clear waters, explore vibrant marine life while snorkeling, and unwind as you wait for a stunning sunset.
Schedule: Pick up time: 7:30 a.m. or 11:30 a.m.
Includes: Light refreshments and beverages on board
Recommendations: Use sunscreen and a hat to protect from the sun
Carry a waterproof camera for underwater photos
Wear comfortable sandals or water shoes

TourWildlifeTuncale.Name: Tour Wildlife Tuncale
TourWildlifeTuncale.Introduction: A guided nature experience in the Tenorio Rainforest, perfect for birdwatchers and wildlife enthusiasts.
TourWildlifeTuncale.Description: Explore the lush biodiversity of the Tenorio Rainforest on this unforgettable tour. Enjoy birdwatching, spot sloths in their natural habitat, visit the majestic Tenorio Volcano, and savor a delicious lunch in Bebedero. A must for nature lovers and adventure seekers.
Schedule: Pick up time: 7:00 a.m. or 9:00 a.m.
Recommendations: Wear comfortable clothing and hiking shoes
Bring a camera for wildlife photography

TourPaloVerde.Name: Tour Palo Verde
TourPaloVerde.Introduction: A unique experience for nature lovers, combining wildlife observation, cultural heritage, and agricultural traditions in the beautiful Palo Verde region.
TourPaloVerde.Description: Discover the wonders of nature and culture on this guided tour. Navigate the Tempisque River to observe a variety of birds, reptiles, and amphibians in their natural habitat. Learn about local agricultural practices and enjoy an authentic Costa Rican lunch, followed by a traditional ceramics exhibition.
TourPaloVerde.Location: Palo Verde National Park, Tempisque River
Schedule: Morning tour: Pick up at 7:00 a.m.
Afternoon tour: Pick up at 1:00 p.m.
Attractions: Rich biodiversity including birds, reptiles, and amphibians
Recommendations: Wear light, comfortable clothing and shoes
Bring a camera for wildlife photography
